test_module.name: sanity/cgcs/verifyOpenStack
test_module.test_case:
####################################################### # Test Sanity CGCS app/test #######################################################
PROMPT .*\]#\s
CALL env TYPE \n SINK 1 SEC
TYPE source /etc/nova/openrc \n WAIT 3 SEC
LOOKFOR nova-cert \| controller-0 \| internal \| enabled \| up LOOKFOR nova-conductor \| controller-0 \| internal \| enabled \| up LOOKFOR nova-consoleauth \| controller-0 \| internal \| enabled \| up LOOKFOR nova-network \| controller-0 \| internal \| enabled \| down LOOKFOR nova-scheduler \| controller-0 \| internal \| enabled \| up TYPE nova service-list \n WAIT 5 SEC
LOOKFOR # wait for the prompt again WAIT 1 SEC
LOOKFOR controller-0 \| controller \| unlocked \| enabled \| available FAILIF controller-0 \| internal \| disabled \| TYPE system host-list\n WAIT 5 SEC
PASS
